name: WhereIsHitchcock
0:
”Alexa, ask Where Is Hitchcock in The Lady Vanishes”
”Alexa, Open Where Is Hitchcock and give me cameos for Rope”
”Alexa, ask Where Is Hitchcock to tell me about Lifeboat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: where is hitchcock
des: Alfred Hitchcock appeared in cameos in some, but not all, of his films. This skill will tell you, for a film in which he appears, when he appears and what is going on at the time. If the requested film does not contain a cameo, the skill will tell you that, and if the requested film is not a Hitchcock film, the skill will tell you that as well. For "The Man Who Knew Too Much," add "original" or "remake" after the name.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
